summary: The diff updates PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts to use a new first footer image path. However, the image is referenced as '/assets/20260228_092922_0002.png' instead of the required path '/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png', and there is no evidence that the image file was saved as 'frontend/public/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded image as a static asset at 'frontend/public/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png'
missing_requirements.reason: No new file was added to 'frontend/public/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png'. The diff shows 0 added files, and the image is referenced by its original filename '/assets/20260228_092922_0002.png' rather than '/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png'.

missing_requirements.requirement: PreviewDialog.tsx and renderDocumentToCanvas.ts must reference the new image at '/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png'
missing_requirements.reason: Both files use '/assets/20260228_092922_0002.png' as the first footer image path instead of the required '/assets/generated/footer-image-1.png'.
